definition: A female canine, typically used to refer to a specific gender of a certain animal species.

examples.english: The female dog is very playful.

examples.german: Meine Hündin hat gerade Welpen bekommen.
examples.english: My female dog just had puppies.

examples.german: Die Hündin bellte laut, um ihre Besitzer zu warnen.
examples.english: The female dog barked loudly to warn her owners.

examples.german: Die Hündin wurde zur Zucht eingesetzt.
examples.english: The female dog was used for breeding.

examples.german: Die Hündin folgte ihrem Herrchen auf Schritt und Tritt.
examples.english: The female dog followed her master everywhere.
